course.subject: HUMA
course.name: Chinese Diasporas: A Global History
course.description: Before 1700, the Chinese population was concentrated in core areas of China Proper. Nonetheless,significant numbers of Chinese people moved to the frontiers of an expanding empire and across it borders, while Chinese families adapted to migration as a way of life. Critically employing the notion of "diasporas," this course traces this worldwide circulation of Chinese people over the ensuing three centuries.
